education_text.0: Trygve Mikkjel Heyerdahl Reenskaug (born 21 June 1930) is a      Norwegian computer scientist and professor emeritus of the      University of Oslo University of OsloTrygve Mikkjel Heyerdahl Reenskaug (born 21 June 1930) is a      Norwegian computer scientist and professor emeritus of the      University of Oslo University of OsloHe has been extensively involved in research into oriented methods and developed the      redirect    Object Oriented Role Analysis and Modeling Object Oriented Role Analysis and Modeling (OOram) and the OOram tool in 1983Reenskaug wrote the book Working With Objects
